default.task_description: Confirm the rental or purchase of property on arrival
default.importance_explanation: Finalizing your long-term housing upon arrival provides a stable base to begin settling in.

default.task_description: Ensure your travel insurance covers your needs until you obtain local coverage
default.importance_explanation: Verifying your insurance coverage provides peace of mind for unexpected events during your initial period in the new country.

default.task_description: Obtain or activate housing insurance (renters or homeowners)
default.importance_explanation: Securing housing insurance protects your belongings and provides liability coverage for your new residence.

default.task_description: Obtain local health insurance or ensure existing coverage applies
default.importance_explanation: Access to healthcare is essential, and navigating the local health insurance system is a priority upon arrival.

default.task_description: Activate or set up local mobile phone service/eSIM
default.importance_explanation: Having a working local phone number is crucial for communication, accessing services, and setting up accounts.

default.task_description: Determine the closest location of basic essential services (grocery store, pharmacy, etc.)
default.importance_explanation: Locating essential services helps you quickly settle into your new neighborhood and access daily necessities.

default.task_description: Begin the process of obtaining a local driver's license
default.importance_explanation: Depending on the country and your origin license, obtaining a local driver's license may be required to legally drive.

default.task_description: Ensure utilities are set up at your new residence (electricity, water, gas, internet)
default.importance_explanation: Setting up essential utilities is necessary for comfortable living in your new home.

default.task_description: Purchase all needed basic items for the household
default.importance_explanation: Acquiring basic household items helps make your new residence feel like home.

default.task_description: If employment is not secured, register with local recruiters or begin job search activities
default.importance_explanation: Finding employment is crucial for financial stability and settling into your new country.

default.task_description: Open a local bank account
default.importance_explanation: Having a local bank account simplifies managing finances, receiving income, and paying bills in the new country.

default.task_description: Register with local authorities or your embassy/consulate
default.importance_explanation: Registering your presence with local authorities and your embassy is often a legal requirement and provides a point of contact in case of emergencies.

default.task_description: Explore transportation options and obtain local public transport passes if applicable
default.importance_explanation: Understanding local transportation helps you navigate your new city efficiently.

Renting.importance_explanation: Collecting your rental car provides immediate transportation upon arrival.

Bringing.task_description: Confirm the arrival of your vehicle and arrange pickup from port/depot
Bringing.due_date: Within 1-7 days of arrival (depending on shipping)
Bringing.importance_explanation: Retrieving your vehicle is necessary for personal transportation.

Bringing.task_description: Complete vehicle import procedures and pay applicable taxes/duties
Bringing.importance_explanation: Properly importing your vehicle and paying duties is required to legally own and register it in the new country.

Bringing.task_description: Register your vehicle in the new location
Bringing.importance_explanation: Registering your vehicle is a legal requirement for driving in the new country.

Bringing.task_description: Obtain local car insurance for your vehicle
Bringing.importance_explanation: Car insurance is mandatory in most places and protects you financially in case of accidents.

Pets.task_description: Pick up your pets from quarantine or cargo if applicable
Pets.importance_explanation: Retrieving your pets is the priority upon arrival to reunite your family.

Pets.task_description: Help your pets adjust to their new environment
Pets.importance_explanation: Providing a comfortable and safe space helps your pets acclimate to their new home.

Pets.task_description: Obtain or activate pet insurance in the new country
Pets.importance_explanation: Pet insurance helps cover unexpected veterinary costs in your new location.

Pets.task_description: Source pet supplies such as food, treats, and toys
Pets.importance_explanation: Ensuring you have necessary supplies for your pets is essential for their care.

Pets.task_description: Find nearby vets to establish patienthood
Pets.importance_explanation: Identifying a local veterinarian is important for your pet's ongoing health needs and emergencies.

Children.task_description: Check in at the children's new school and confirm enrollment
Children.importance_explanation: Ensuring your children are properly enrolled and ready to start school is important for their adjustment and education.

Children.task_description: Help children adjust to their new environment and school
Children.importance_explanation: Providing support and opportunities to socialize helps children settle into their new home and community.
